text: Anriyum, narakak kavalalikalai malakkukal allamal nam akkavillai, kahpirkalukku avarkalutaiya ennikkaiyai oru cotanaiyakave akkinom - vetam kotukkappattavarkal - urutikolvatarkum, iman kontavarkal, imanai atikarittuk kolvatarkum vetam kotukkappattavarkalum, muhminkalum cantekam kollamal iruppatarkum (nam ivvaru akkinom); eninum evarkalutaiya irutayankalil noy irukkirato, avarkalum kahpirkalum; "allah (pattonpatu enum inta ennikkaiyin) utaranattaik kontu e(nna karut)tai natinan?" Ena ketpatarkakavume (ivvaru akkinom). Ivvare allah tan natiyavarkalai valikettilum vitukiran, innum tan natiyavarkalai nervaliyilum celuttukiran, anriyum um'mutaiya iraivanin pataikalai avanait tavira marrevarum ariya mattarkal, (sakar parriya ceyti) manitarkalukku ninaivuttum nallupatecameyanri verillai
